items.title: Ipswich sign Sunderland midfielder Neil on loan
items.snippet: Ipswich Town sign midfielder Dan Neil from Sunderland on loan until the end of the season, when he will leave the Black Cats.

items.title: Why do Premier League teams spend less in January?

items.title: Aston Villa in talks to re-sign Luiz
items.snippet: Aston Villa are in talks to re-sign midfielder Douglas Luiz 18 months after he left the club for Juventus.

items.title: Bove signs for Watford after airport meeting

items.title: Flamengo close in on £35m deal for Paqueta
items.snippet: Flamengo are close to re-signing West Ham forward Lucas Paqueta for more than 41m euros (£35.5m).

items.title: Robertson unlikely to move to Spurs
